TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SecurityTokenService extends System.Object

summary.span: 定义安全令牌服务 (STS) 的属性和方法的抽象基类。

span.span: The abstract base class that defines the properties and methods of a security token service (STS).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要创建 STS，必须从 类派生。To create an STS you must derive from the class. 在自定义类中，必须至少覆盖 和 方法。In your custom class you must, at a minimum, override the and methods. 使用这些替代，使用类中定义的所有其他方法的默认实现创建的 STS 能够颁发安全令牌，以响应安全令牌请求（RST）。With these overrides, the STS created using the default implementation of all the other methods defined in the class is capable of issuing security tokens in response to security token requests (RST). 也就是说，实现 WS-TRUST 规范中定义的问题绑定。That is, the Issue binding defined in the WS-Trust specification is implemented. 此绑定是在 方法中实现的。This binding is implemented in the method. 在默认情况下，不会实现任何其他 WS-TRUST 绑定（"续订"、"取消" 和 "验证"），如果遇到与这些绑定之一相对应的 RST，则会向调用方返回相应的错误。None of the other WS-Trust bindings (Renew, Cancel, and Validate) are implemented in the default case and an appropriate fault is returned to the caller if an RST that corresponds to one of these bindings is encountered. 当然，您可以重写适当的方法（、和 ）来实现 STS 中的这些绑定。You can, of course, override the appropriate methods (, , and ) to implement these bindings in your STS. > [!IMPORTANT] > 实现生产就绪的 STS 需要认真规划和大量资源，以减轻公开此类服务时所固有的潜在安全风险。Implementing a production-ready STS entails careful planning and considerable resources to mitigate the potential security risks inherent in exposing such a service. 大多数使用 Windows Identity Foundation （WIF）的开发人员将开发将标识管理外包给 STS 的应用程序，而不是开发 STS 本身。Most developers using Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) will be developing applications that outsource identity management to an STS, rather than developing an STS itself. WIF 提供 Visual Studio 扩展，即 Visual Studio 2012 的标识和访问工具，帮助开发人员在开发环境中测试解决方案。WIF provides a Visual Studio extension, the Identity and Access Tool for Visual Studio 2012, to help developers test solutions in the development environment. 此工具包括一个 STS、`LocalSTS`，您可以将其配置为向您正在开发的应用程序提供特定的声明。This tool includes an STS, `LocalSTS`, that you can configure to serve specific claims to the application that you are developing. 有关标识和访问工具的详细信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 2012 的标识和访问工具](/dotnet/framework/security/identity-and-access-tool-for-vs)。For more information about the Identity and Access tool, see [Identity and Access Tool for Visual Studio 2012](/dotnet/framework/security/identity-and-access-tool-for-vs). 在某些情况下，`LocalSTS` 可能无法提供充分测试您的应用程序所需的功能;例如，在涉及到开发用于应用程序的自定义令牌处理程序的方案中。In some scenarios, `LocalSTS` may not provide the functionality necessary to adequately test your application; for example, in a scenario that involves developing a custom token handler for use by an application. 在这些情况下，可以从 派生，以创建一个或多个可在开发环境中部署并可用于在应用程序中测试此类功能的简单 Sts。In these cases, you can derive from to create one or more simple STSs that can be deployed in your development environment and that can be used to test such features in your application. 本部分的其余部分重点介绍 类公开的方法，这些方法使你能够实现简单的 STS 并扩展令牌颁发管道。The rest of this section focuses on the methods exposed by the class that enable you to implement a simple STS and extend the token issuance pipeline. 下面的列表简要介绍了开发人员在测试或开发环境中的主要重要性方法。The following list provides a brief overview of the methods of primary importance to the developer for use in a test or development environment. - 方法。The method. 此方法返回包含 RP 相关信息的 对象。This method returns a object that contains information about the RP. 此对象用于令牌颁发管道的其余部分，其中包含有关要在响应中使用的签名和加密凭据的信息，以及 `AppliesTo` 和 `ReplyTo` （如果需要）。This object is used in the rest of the token issuance pipeline and includes information about the signing and encrypting credentials to use in the response, as well as the `AppliesTo` and `ReplyTo` (if required) addresses. 必须重写此方法。You must override this method. - 方法。The method. 此方法返回一个 对象，该对象包含要返回到 RP 的声明。This method returns an object that contains the claims to return to the RP. 必须重写此方法。You must override this method. - 方法。The method. 此方法实现标记请求管道，该管道处理传入的安全令牌请求（RST）并向调用方返回响应（RSTR），其中包含可用于向 RP 进行身份验证的令牌。This method implements the token request pipeline, which processes an incoming security token request (RST) and returns a response (RSTR) to the caller that contains a token that can be used to authenticate with an RP. 类中定义的许多其他方法都从此方法调用，包括 和 方法。Many of the other methods defined in the class are called from this method, including the and methods. 您不必重写此方法，但了解它实现的令牌请求管道可能会很有帮助。You do not have to override this method, but an understanding of the token request pipeline it implements may be helpful. 通过 类配置 STS。An STS is configured through the class. ## Examples 主题中使用的代码示例取自 `Custom Token` 示例。The code examples that are used in the topics are taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 此示例提供了一些自定义类，这些类可用于处理简单 Web 标记（SWT），并包括能够为 SWT 标记提供服务的被动 STS 实现。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT) and it includes an implementation of a passive STS that is capable of serving an SWT token. 有关如何实现活动 STS 的示例，可以参阅 `Federation Metadata` 示例。For an example of how to implement an active STS, you can see the `Federation Metadata` sample. 有关这些示例以及可用于 WIF 的其他示例以及要从何处下载这些示例和其他示例的信息，请参阅[WIF 代码示例索引](/dotnet/framework/security/wif-code-sample-)。For information about these samples and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](/dotnet/framework/security/wif-code-sample-). 下面的代码演示如何使用 类实现被动 STS。The following code shows the implementation of a passive STS using the class. [!code-csharp[WIFCustomTokenSTS#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokensts/cs/passivests/customsecuritytokenservice.cs#3)] 下面的代码演示如何通过从 `default.aspx.cs` 文件的隐藏代码中调用 方法来调用自定义被动 STS 来处理 WS 联合身份验证请求。The following code shows how to invoke a custom passive STS to process a WS-Federation request by calling the method from the code behind in the `default.aspx.cs` file. [!code-csharp[WIFCustomTokenSTS#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokensts/cs/passivests/default.aspx.cs#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是从令牌颁发管道调用的，该管道由 方法实现。The method is called from the token issuance pipeline, which is implemented by the method. 它将返回一个 ，其中包含基于令牌请求者（`principal` 参数）、传入 RST （`request` 参数）和要为其使用令牌的信赖方（`scope` 参数）在已颁发的安全令牌中包含的声明。It returns an that contains the claims to include in the issued security token based on the requestor of the token (the `principal` parameter), the incoming RST (the `request` parameter), and the relying party for which the token is intended (the `scope` parameter). 此方法中的逻辑主要涉及回答以下问题：The logic in this method is primarily concerned with answering the following questions: - **哪些声明类型应包含在响应中基于它的目标 RP？****Which claim types should be included in the response based on the RP for which it is intended?** 通常，根据每个 rp 所需的声明类型的列表或基于请求的请求，通过检查请求的 属性，来确定这一点。Typically this is decided on a per-RP basis from lists of claim types required for each RP or on a per-request basis by examining the property of the request. 不过，确定要包括在响应中的声明的逻辑和详细信息完全取决于你的实现。However, the logic and details for determining the claims to include in the response is completely up to your implementation. - **应将哪些声明值分配给响应中的声明？****Which claim values should be assigned to the claims in the response?** 对于标识提供者（IP-HTTPS），这通常意味着使用请求者的 （由 `principal` 参数提供）中的一个或多个声明访问存储（或其他实体），以返回所需声明类型的值。For an Identity Provider (IP-STS) this typically means using one or more claims in the requestor's (provided by the `principal` parameter) to access a store (or other entity) to return values for the required claim types. 对于联合身份验证提供程序（R-STS），这通常意味着在请求者的传入声明上执行某种类型的处理来满足请求;可能对请求者提供的某些声明执行筛选或转换，同时通过未修改的方式传递其他声明。For a Federation Provider (R-STS) this typically means performing some kind of processing on the requestor's incoming claims to fulfill the request; perhaps performing filtering or transformation on some claims presented by the requestor, while passing others through unmodified. 当然，正如确定要包含在响应中的声明，如何确定这些声明的值的详细信息和逻辑都取决于您的实现。Of course, as in the case of deciding which claims to include in the response, the details and logic of how to determine the values of these claims is up to your implementation. ## Examples 本主题中使用的代码示例摘自 `Custom Token` 示例。The code example that is used in this topic is taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 此示例提供了一些自定义类，这些类可用于处理简单 Web 标记（SWT），并包括能够为 SWT 标记提供服务的被动 STS 实现。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT) and it includes an implementation of a passive STS that is capable of serving an SWT token. 有关如何实现活动 STS 的示例，可以参阅 `Federation Metadata` 示例。For an example of how to implement an active STS, you can see the `Federation Metadata` sample. 有关这些示例以及可用于 WIF 的其他示例以及要从何处下载这些示例和其他示例的信息，请参阅[WIF 代码示例索引](/dotnet/framework/security/wif-code-sample-)。For information about these samples and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](/dotnet/framework/security/wif-code-sample-). 下面的代码演示如何重写 方法，以便为 STS 返回声明。The following code shows how to override the method to return claims for your STS. 在此示例中，将忽略请求安全令牌（RST）消息，并返回基于在 STS 进行身份验证的用户的声明的集合。In this example, the Request Security Token (RST) message is ignored and a collection of claims based on the user as authenticated at the STS is returned. [!code-csharp[WIFCustomTokenSTS#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokensts/cs/passivests/customsecuritytokenservice.cs#6)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法被称为令牌颁发管道中的最后一个步骤，该步骤由 方法实现。The method is called as the last step from the token issuance pipeline, which is implemented by the method. 它通过使用原始传入请求（RST）和令牌颁发管道中前面步骤中生成的令牌描述符来创建和返回响应（RSTR）。It creates and returns the response (RSTR) by using the original incoming request (RST) and the token descriptor that was built up during previous steps in the token issuance pipeline. 默认实现通过将 request 参数中指定的 RST 传递到 构造函数来创建 RSTR，对传入 的令牌描述符调用 方法，将其属性应用到新创建的 RSTR，并使用标记描述符上的 属性设置 RSTR 上的 属性，最后根据下表设置 RSTR 的 属性：The default implementation creates the RSTR by passing the RST specified in the request parameter to the constructor, invoking the method on the token descriptor passed into to apply its properties to the newly created RSTR, setting the property on the RSTR by using the property on the token descriptor, and finally setting the property on the RSTR according to the following table: |`RST.ReplyTo` 属性`RST.ReplyTo` property| 属性。 property.|`RSTR.ReplyTo` 属性`RSTR.ReplyTo` property| |----------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------| |设置Set|未设置Not Set|未设置Not Set| |设置Set|设置Set|| |未设置Not Set|设置Set|未设置Not Set| |未设置Not Set|未设置Not Set|未设置Not Set|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是在 方法之后从令牌颁发管道调用的，并且应返回为传入请求配置的 对象。The method is called from the token issuance pipeline after the method and should return a object configured for the incoming request. （令牌颁发管道是在 方法中实现的。） 对象封装与安全令牌请求（RST）关联的 RP 的相关信息。(The token issuance pipeline is implemented in the method.) The object encapsulates information about the RP associated with the security token request (RST). 这包括有关要与 RP 一起使用的加密和签名凭据以及是否在响应中加密任何已颁发的令牌和/或对称密钥的信息。This includes information about the encrypting and signing credentials to be used with the RP and whether or not to encrypt any issued tokens and/or symmetric keys in the response. 在 方法中执行的一些典型任务如下：Some typical tasks performed in the method are: - 确定用于令牌的 RP 是否为可识别的 RP。Determine whether the RP for which the token is intended is a recognized RP. 完成此操作的方式取决于你的实现。How this is accomplished depends on your implementation. 如果目标 RP 不是此 STS 的有效 RP，此方法应引发 。If the intended RP is not a valid RP for this STS, then the method should throw an . - 确定要在响应中使用的签名凭据（RSTR）并相应地设置 属性。Determine the signing credentials to be used in the response (RSTR) and set the property accordingly. - 确定是否应加密响应和/或任何包含的对称密钥以及要用于加密的凭据。Determine whether the response and/or any included symmetrical keys should be encrypted and the credentials to be used for encryption. 相应设置 、和 属性。Set the , , and properties accordingly. > [!IMPORTANT] > 默认情况下，"" 和 "" 属性设置为 "`true`" 以防止 STS 颁发不安全的令牌。By default, the and properties are set `true` to prevent the STS from issuing tokens that are not secure. 建议不要将这些属性设置为在生产环境中 `false`。It is recommended that these properties never be set to `false` in a production environment. - 确定应该将响应返回到的地址。Determine the address to which the response should be returned. 请相应地设置 或 属性。Set either the or property accordingly. ## Examples 本主题中使用的代码示例摘自 `Custom Token` 示例。The code example that is used in this topic is taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 此示例提供了一些自定义类，这些类可用于处理简单 Web 标记（SWT），并包括能够为 SWT 标记提供服务的被动 STS 实现。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT) and it includes an implementation of a passive STS that is capable of serving an SWT token. 有关如何实现活动 STS 的示例，可以参阅 `Federation Metadata` 示例。For an example of how to implement an active STS, you can see the `Federation Metadata` sample. 有关这些示例以及可用于 WIF 的其他示例以及要从何处下载这些示例和其他示例的信息，请参阅[WIF 代码示例索引](/dotnet/framework/security/wif-code-sample-)。For information about these samples and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](/dotnet/framework/security/wif-code-sample-). 下面的代码示例演示 方法的实现。The following code example shows an implementation of the method. 此实现将验证 RP 是否被 STS 识别，验证请求中的 地址并相应地设置 属性，并根据文件中硬编码的证书设置用于 RP 的签名和加密凭据。This implementation verifies that the RP is recognized by the STS, validates the address in the request and sets the property accordingly, and sets the signing and encrypting credentials to use with the RP based on certificates that are hard-coded in the file. [!code-csharp[WIFCustomTokenSTS#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokensts/cs/passivests/customsecuritytokenservice.cs#4)] [!code-csharp[WIFCustomTokenSTS#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokensts/cs/passivests/customsecuritytokenservice.cs#5)] [!code-csharp[WIFCustomTokenSTS#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokensts/cs/passivests/customsecuritytokenservice.cs#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法实现 WS-TRUST 规范中定义的问题绑定。This method implements the Issue binding defined in the WS-Trust specification. 方法的默认实现通过令牌颁发（声明颁发）管道处理传入请求（RST），并返回包含包含相应声明的安全令牌的响应（RSTR），以便对请求者使用 RP 或适当的异常进行身份验证。The default implementation of the method processes the incoming request (RST) through a token issuance (claims issuance) pipeline and returns either a response (RSTR) that contains a security token with the appropriate claims to authenticate the requestor with the RP or an appropriate exception. 默认实现中的令牌颁发管道包含对以下方法（ 类）的调用。The token issuance pipeline in the default implementation consists of calls to the following methods (of the class). 1. 用于验证请求的 方法（RST）。The method to validate the request (RST). 2. 用于获取 对象的 方法，该对象包含与请求关联的信赖方（RP）的相关信息。The method to get a object that contains information about the relying party (RP) associated with the request. 必须重写此方法。You must override this method. 如果 返回 `null`，则将引发 。If returns `null`, a is thrown. 3. 方法，该方法基于 RST 和上一步中返回的 对象返回安全令牌说明符。The method to return a security token descriptor based on the RST and the object returned in the previous step. 安全令牌描述符（）在可以由令牌处理程序使用的窗体中包含有关请求的信息。The security token descriptor () contains information about the request in a form that can be used by a token handler. 属性设置为调用返回的描述符。The property is set to the descriptor returned by the call. 如果返回 `null` 或说明符的 属性 `null`，则将引发 。If `null` is returned or if the property of the descriptor is `null`, an is thrown. 如果 `true` 属性，但返回的描述符的 属性 `null`，也会引发异常。The exception is also thrown if the property is `true` but the property on the returned descriptor is `null`. 4. 用于基于请求的令牌种类获取适当标记处理程序的 方法。The method to get the appropriate token handler based on the kind of token requested. 如果返回 `null`，则会引发 。If `null` is returned, a is thrown. 5. 用于获取令牌的颁发者名称的 方法。The method to get the issuer name for the token. 如果名称为 `null` 或为空，则引发 ;否则，设置描述符的 属性。Throws an if the name is `null` or empty; otherwise sets the property on the descriptor. 6. 用于获取令牌生存期的 方法，并设置描述符的 属性。The method to get the lifetime for the token and sets the property on the descriptor. 7. 用于获取要包含在已颁发令牌中的证明令牌的 方法，并设置描述符的 属性。The method to get the proof token to include in the issued token and sets the property on the descriptor. 8. 用于获取要包含在已颁发令牌中的声明的 方法，并设置描述符的 属性。The method to get the claims to include in the issued token and sets the property on the descriptor. 必须重写此方法。You must override this method. 9. 用于创建包含已颁发令牌的响应（RSTR）的 方法。The method to create a response (RSTR) that contains the issued token. 可以重写 方法以实现自定义令牌颁发管道;但是，在开发和测试 环境中，这种情况通常并不是必需的。You can override the method to implement a custom token issuance pipeline; however this is typically not necessary in the development and test environments for which most custom implementations of the class are intended. 在许多情况下，会重写 和 方法，还可以选择重写 方法，以便为你的环境提供可维护的 STS。In many of these cases you override the and methods and optionally override the method to provide a serviceable STS for your environment. 如果需要进一步的自定义，则通常可以通过重写方法来提供此方法，这些方法可实现上面列出的默认令牌颁发管道的每个阶段。If further customization is necessary you can often provide it by overriding the methods that implement each stage of the default token issuance pipeline listed above.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从令牌颁发管道（ 方法）中调用 方法来验证传入的 RST。The method is called from the token issuance pipeline (the method) to validate the incoming RST. 根据 STS 的要求（策略）对 RST 进行验证，如果无效，则会引发相应的异常。The RST is validated against the requirements (policy) of the STS and an appropriate exception is thrown if it is not valid. 类的默认实现仅支持 RST RSTR 模式，并且仅支持 WS-TRUST 规范的问题绑定（请求的 属性必须设置为 ）。The default implementation of the class supports only the RST-RSTR pattern and only the Issue binding of the WS-Trust specification (the property of the request must be set to ). 此方法的默认实现将强制实施这些要求（以及 "异常" 一节中所述）。The default implementation of this method enforces these requirements (and others noted in the exceptions section). 如果必须为自定义 STS 强制执行不同的验证要求，则可以重写此方法。You can override this method if you must enforce different validation requirements for your custom STS.
